attributes.action: answer the question of which biscuit he prefers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While I appreciate the fact that the PM took time out from his busy schedule to take part in the Mumsnet live web chat, I feel that he should have answered the question. What biscuits does he prefer?

rejection.details: An answer to this question has been posted on the Downing Street Twitter account: http://twitter.com/downingstreet
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
